Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hp1470 (natural AMPs; UCLL1; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals

Literature Information.Literature: Discovery: TBA.Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (84.62%) toHp1090I: 23%: F: 15%.Activity: active against S. aureus 5 strains and 4 MRSA strains (MIC 6.25-12.5 ug/ml), S. epidermidis 2 strains (MIC 25 ug/ml), M. luteus AB93113 (MIC 50 ug/ml), B. subtilis ATCC6051 (MIC 25 ug/ml) but not E.coli ATCC8739 or ATCC25922 (MIC >100 ug/ml).   bacteriostatic not killing.Structure: helical in TFE (30-70%).Animal model:mouse: it protected mice from death when treated i.p. at 60 mg/kg.
Literature Information.Author: Li S, Liu G, Kang J, Li Z, Cao Z. 2023
Literature Information.Title: The inhibitory activity of a new scorpion venom-derived antimicrobial peptide Hp1470 against Gram-positive bacteria.
